players.name: Alice
memory: Charlie: "Alice is the mafioso. We need to arrest her now before she kills again."
You: "Alice is not the mafioso. Charlie is trying to frame me to save the real killer."
You: "Alice is being unfairly targeted by Charlie. Diana and I both disagree with him, so maybe Charlie is trying to divert attention from himself."
Charlie: "Alice is lying to protect herself. Diana's vague disagreement isn't proof—it's suspicious. We must trust the investigation results and arrest Alice to keep the town safe."
